title: Canadian Solar to Attend Nomura China Investor Forum 2015 in Shanghai
text:
Canadian Solar to Attend Nomura China Investor Forum 2015 in Shanghai   Published on 2015-09-08 14:47:48 Canadian Solar to Attend Nomura China Investor Forum 2015 in Shanghai -- GUELPH, Ontario   > GUELPH, Ontario   Canadian Solar Inc. (NASDAQ: CSIQ ), one of the world's largest solar power companies, today announced that it is scheduled to attend Nomura China Investor Forum 2015 on Wednesday, September 9, 2015 and Thursday, September 10, 2015 at Pudong Shangri-la Hotel in Shanghai . During the conference, Dr. Shawn Qu , Chairman and Chief Executive Officer and Ed Job , Director of Investor Relations will be available to meet with institutional investors. About Canadian Solar Founded in 2001 in Canada , Canadian Solar is one of the world's largest and foremost solar power companies. As a leading manufacturer of solar photovoltaic modules and a provider of solar energy solutions, Canadian Solar has a geographically diversified pipeline of utility-scale power projects. In the past 14 years, Canadian Solar has successfully deployed over 11 GW of premium quality modules in over 70 countries around the world. Furthermore, Canadian Solar is one of the most bankable companies in the world, having been publically listed on NASDAQ since 2006. For additional information about the company, follow Canadian Solar on Facebook , Twitter , LinkedIn , or on the website . 
SOURCE Canadian Solar Inc.
